qas.question: How many members are in the Presbyterian Church of Brazil?
As of 2011, how many members were in The Renewed Presbyterian Church in Brazil?
When was Conservative Presbyterian Church formed?
What is the name of the Presbyterian church in Brazil with Dutch origins?

answers.text: The Evangelical Reformed Church in Brazil

qas.question: The Presbyterian Church of Brazil, with 350,000 members is located where?
As of 1940, how many members does the Renewed Presbyterian Church have?
Having 350,000 presbyteries, the Conservative Presbyterian Church was founded in which year?
In what year did pastor Pereira found the Bible Presbyterian Church USA?
How many members does the United Presbyterian Church in Korea have?

context: In <b4_0>Brazil<b4_0/>, the Presbyterian Church of Brazil (Igreja Presbiteriana do Brasil) totals approximately <a0_0>1,011,300<a0_0/> members; other Presbyterian churches (Independents, United, Conservatives, Renovated, etc.) in this nation have around 350,000 members. The Renewed Presbyterian Church in Brazil was influenced by the charismatic movement and has about <a1_0><b5_0>131 000<b5_0/><a1_0/> members as of 2011. The Conservative Presbyterian Church was founded in <a2_0><b6_0>1940<b6_0/><a2_0/> and has eight presbyteries. The Fundamentalist Presbyterian church in Brazil was influenced by Karl McIntosh and the Bible Presbyterian church USA and has around 1 800 members. The Independent Presbyterian Church in Brasil was founded in <b7_0>1903<b7_0/> by pastor Pereira, has 500 congregations and 75 000 members. The United Presbyterian Church in Brazil has around <b8_0>4 000<b8_0/> members. There are also ethnic Korean Presbyterian churches in the country. <a3_0>The Evangelical Reformed Church in Brazil<a3_0/> has Dutch origin. The Reformed Churches in Brazil were recently founded by the Canadian Reformed Churches with the Reformed Church in the Netherlands (liberated).
